Article Title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo’s playing tonight vs Charlotte Hornets? Latest uipdate on the Milwaukee Bucks star’s injury report (November 12, 2025)
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo's Injury Report November 12, 2025 (Image via Getty)

Milwaukee Bucks could be without their superstar forward Giannis Antetokounmpo

Giannis Antetokounmpo’s Injury Report vs Charlotte Hornets (November 12, 2025)

Milwaukee Bucks Injury Report vs Charlotte Hornets (November 12, 2025)

What to Expect Against the Hornets

Thetonight as they take on the Charlotte Hornets. Giannis is officially listed as questionable due to left knee patellar tendinopathy - a recurring issue that has required close monitoring by the Bucks’ medical staff throughout the season. While the condition isn’t considered severe, it continues to be a nagging concern for the two-time MVP, particularly as the team looks to manage his workload during the demanding early stretch of the season.The Milwaukee Bucks are exercising caution with Giannis, as his availability for tonight’s matchup will likely be determined after pregame warm-ups. His response to light drills and team activities will play a major role in whether he takes the court. The decision underscores Milwaukee’s focus on maintaining Giannis’ long-term health, given his central role in the franchise’s championship aspirations this season.Giannis Antetokounmpo has been on and off the injury report in recent weeks due to this lingering knee issue. Despite that, he has continued to deliver dominant performances when active, averaging over 33 points and 12 rebounds per game. The Bucks have strategically managed his minutes and training sessions to prevent aggravation, and the results have paid off - Giannis has looked explosive on offense while remaining a defensive anchor.The Milwaukee Bucks are currently battling for position near the top of the Eastern Conference standings, making Giannis’ availability critical. His presence on the floor dramatically shifts the team’s offensive rhythm and defensive stability, and any absence could expose Milwaukee’s depth concerns. With the team already dealing with multiple injuries, the pressure to keep Giannis healthy has never been greater.Milwaukee Bucks enters tonight’s contest with a few notable absences beyond Giannis Antetokounmpo. Kevin Porter Jr. remains out following right meniscus surgery, while Taurean Prince is sidelined with a neck strain. Additionally, Alex Antetokounmpo is unavailable as part of his G League two-way assignment. These absences have forced the Bucks to rely heavily on their core lineup and bench depth, increasing the load on players like Damian Lillard, Khris Middleton, and Brook Lopez to step up both offensively and defensively.Tonight’s game carries added weight as it marks the start of a two-game series with potential NBA Cup implications. The Bucks are expected to approach the matchup strategically, especially with Giannis’ status uncertain. If he suits up, expect him to play a leadership role, driving Milwaukee’s offense and setting the tone early against a Hornets team that has struggled with consistency and injuries of its own.However, if Giannis Antetokounmpo is ruled out, the Milwaukee Bucks will need to lean on their supporting cast to fill the void. Bettors and fans alike should monitor Milwaukee’s official injury report closer to tip-off, as any late updates on Giannis’ condition could significantly impact both the game’s outcome and betting lines.Also read: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs the Milwaukee Bucks? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (November 12, 2025) Giannis Antetokounmpo remains the heart of the Milwaukee Bucks, and his health will continue to be a determining factor in the team’s pursuit of success - not just tonight against Charlotte, but throughout the rest of the 2025 season.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo is officially listed as questionable due to left knee patellar tendinopathy. The milwaukee bucks are currently battling for position near the top of the eastern conference standings. Giannis’ presence on the floor dramatically shifts the team’s offensive rhythm and defensive stability.

Article Title: Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all her medals to Las Vegas thieves while caring for her cancer-stricken mother
Article Text:
Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all her medals to Las Vegas thieves while caring for her cancer-stricken mother (Image Via Getty)

“You see all those medals I won in the past, they are sadly gone,”

Surya Bonaly shares her pain and hopes for recovery



“I think it’s definitely organized by a company or some bad people,”

“European champion or world champion, junior, everything, any medals that I had with my skating,”

“I feel mad. I feel like sometimes I want to cry. Some people just feel like it’s better to steal something from someone than to go to work.”

“I just hope I can find maybe some medals,”

“I really pray that no one’s gonna melt them.”

Former Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole every medal she earned during her career. The 51-year-old, who is battling breast cancer, said the robbery happened while she was in Minnesota caring for her sick mother, who is also fighting lung, breast, and sternum cancer. The burglary took place earlier this month at her Las Vegas home near Durango and Oakey, as confirmed by FOX 5 Vegas on November 11, 2025.When Surya Bonaly returned home, she found her house in chaos. Windows were broken, Wi-Fi wires were cut, and her security cameras were destroyed. Every medal she earned across her 11-year skating career was gone.she wrote on Instagram.According to FOX 5 Vegas, the burglary was not a single break-in. Surveillance footage showed several people entering her property over multiple days.One man wore a black hoodie and another person appeared in a delivery vest. Bonaly later found a similar vest thrown on a nearby street.she told reporters.Bonaly was in Minnesota helping her mother during her treatment when it happened.Three days later, she came home to find everything turned upside down.she said, describing what was stolen.Bonaly’s medals included five European golds from 1991 to 1995 and three World silver medals from 1993 to 1995.Also Read: Islam Makhachev’s Emotional Words About Khabib Nurmagomedov Prove How Strong Their Brother-Like Bond Truly Runs She also competed in three Winter Olympics, famously performing a backflip at the 1998 Nagano Games, becoming the first woman ever to land it on one blade a move later banned.The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department is investigating. Bonaly has urged locals and pawn shops to report if they spot any foreign medals.she said.
Article Summary: Olympic legend surya bonaly is devastated after thieves stole every medal she earned during her career. The 51-year-old, who is battling breast cancer, said the robbery happened while she was in minnesota caring for her sick mother. Surveillance footage showed several people entering her property over multiple days.

Article Title: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs the Milwaukee Bucks? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (November 12, 2025)
Article Text:
LaMelo Ball (Image via AP)

LaMelo Ball will miss yet another game for the Charlotte Hornets

LaMelo Ball’s Injury Status vs Milwaukee Bucks (November 12, 2025)

The Charlotte Hornets’ Struggles Without Ball

Coach’s Optimism and Recovery Outlook

Milwaukee Bucks vs Charlotte Hornets Game Outlook (November 12, 2025)

as they take on the Milwaukee Bucks on November 12, 2025. The Hornets’ star guard remains sidelined with a right ankle impingement, marking his fifth straight missed contest. His absence continues to impact Charlotte’s offensive rhythm and overall performance, as the team searches for stability early in the season.The injury has proven to be more troublesome than initially expected. Although Ball has been making progress in his recovery, the Hornets have not provided a definitive timeline for his return. The 24-year-old guard has struggled with ankle issues throughout his young career, and the team’s medical staff is taking a cautious approach to ensure he avoids another setback before rejoining the lineup.LaMelo Ball’s right ankle impingement first surfaced during the Hornets’ game on November 1. Since then, he has missed every matchup, with the team prioritizing long-term health over short-term results. The Hornets recently assigned Ball to their G League affiliate, the Greensboro Swarm, for a monitored ramp-up process. Reports indicate that he has been participating in limited practice sessions to rebuild strength and mobility, but he remains officially ruled out for the Bucks game tonight.Given his history of ankle sprains and fractures on both legs, Charlotte’s medical staff continues to take a measured approach to his rehabilitation.Charlotte Hornets’ season has taken a downturn in Ball’s absence. The team currently sits at 3-7, losing three consecutive games since the star guard went down. Offensively, the Hornets have lacked the playmaking and floor vision that Ball provides, which previously helped him average 23.3 points, 7.8 rebounds, and 9.8 assists per game this season. His ability to orchestrate the offense and elevate teammates has been sorely missed. To make matters worse, several other contributors - Brandon Miller, Josh Green, and Grant Williams - are also sidelined due to injuries, leaving the Hornets dangerously thin on both ends of the court.Head coach Charles Lee has remained optimistic about LaMelo Ball’s progress, emphasizing that the young guard is improving daily in movement and strength. Lee stated that the organization’s main focus is ensuring Ball’s complete recovery before returning to action. The recent assignment to the G League affiliate suggests that the Hornets are carefully preparing him for a gradual return to full-speed play. While there’s no set date for his comeback, Lee hinted that Ball could resume regular game activities once he clears all medical benchmarks.For tonight’s home matchup, the Hornets enter as underdogs against the Milwaukee Bucks. With LaMelo Ball out, Charlotte is expected to rely heavily on Collin Sexton, whose playmaking and assist numbers have notably increased when Ball isn’t on the court. Bettors looking at player props might find value in Sexton’s assist totals or scoring opportunities given his expanded role.Also read: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo’s playing tonight vs Charlotte Hornets? Latest uipdate on the Milwaukee Bucks star’s injury report (November 12, 2025) In summary, LaMelo Ball’s continued absence due to a right ankle impingement leaves the Hornets facing an uphill battle against the Bucks. While his recovery shows promising signs, Charlotte remains focused on a patient, long-term approach to ensure their franchise cornerstone returns fully healthy and ready to lead the team again.
Article Summary: Lamelo ball remains sidelined with a right ankle impingement. The 24-year-old guard has been assigned to their g league affiliate, the greensboro swarm. He has been participating in limited practice sessions to rebuild strength and mobility. Charlotte hornets are currently 3-7, losing three consecutive games.

Article Title: Megan Thee Stallion receives heartfelt apology from boyfriend Klay Thompson after airport pickup mishap
Article Text:
Megan Thee Stallion and Klay Thompson. Image via: theestallion/Instagram

Klay Thompson apologizes to Megan Thee Stallion after airport mishap





Megan Thee Stallion on her relationship with Klay Thompson





Klay Thompson might be known for his calm demeanor on the court, but off it, the Dallas Mavericks star recently showed his softer side. After arriving late to pick up his girlfriend, rapper Megan Thee Stallion , from the airport, Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and his remorse. The clip, shared by Megan on social media, captured the NBA star trying to make amends with flowers in hand and genuine regret on his face.The moment quickly became a talking point among fans, who couldn’t get enough of the couple’s chemistry and Thompson’s down-to-earth approach. It also comes at a time when both are thriving in their respective careers, with Thompson beginning his new season in Dallas and Megan releasing new music inspired by their relationship.In the video posted online, Klay Thompson can be seen handing Megan a bouquet while apologizing repeatedly for showing up late. “Roses for my boo,” he said while driving her home. “I’m sorry I was late, babe. Damn it. I’m sorry. I thought I timed it well. Ah, just sorry. There’s no excuse.”Fans immediately flooded social media with amused and affectionate reactions, praising Thompson’s gesture as “adorably human.” The incident added another viral moment to their growing list of public appearances since confirming their romance earlier this year.Over the summer, the couple enjoyed a fishing trip that gave fans a glimpse into their playful dynamic. “So today, Klay is taking me on another adventure and we’re going fishing,” Megan said at the time. Thompson responded lovingly: “I got my queen on board, of course I feel cool. I’m the coolest guy in this harbor!”For Megan, whose real name is Megan Jovon Ruth Pete, the relationship marks a new chapter. “This is my first relationship where I’ve ever been with somebody who’s genuinely a nice person, and he makes me genuinely happy,” she told Page Six.“I just never dated somebody like him before and I’m just grateful that he’s here by my side and he feels the same way about me.”Despite occasional public skepticism — even from personalities like Shaquille O’Neal, who jokingly doubted their relationship on The Big Podcast — fans have embraced the pair’s authenticity. O’Neal later called Megan “athletic, so beautiful, and so gorgeous,” insisting his remarks were lighthearted.For now, Thompson and Megan seem unfazed by outside opinions. Their recent viral moment only serves to extend a genuine connection between two stars from different worlds. The duo has been very active on social media to share their personal moments of joy and love. Megan has over 32.7 million followers on Instagram, while Thomson has 16.8 million fans on the platform.Stallion is fully embracing her lover girl era — and fans are loving it. The three-time Grammy winner took to Instagram to tease a behind-the-scenes look at her new single “Lover Girl,” a song she openly admits is inspired by her boyfriend, NBA star Klay Thompson.“This is my song about Klay,” Megan said in the clip with a shy smile. “First n**** in life that has ever gotten a song outta me.” Fans quickly flooded the comments, cheering for the rapper’s happiness and her growing romance with the four-time NBA champion.Listeners have already picked up on the deeper meaning behind “Lover Girl.” In the track, Megan raps about finding someone who truly matches her energy and confidence. “Ayy, your n**** fantasy, my man reality,” she spits, celebrating a relationship built on mutual respect and balance.The lyrics hint at a future together too, with lines about “making big moves” which is a nod to the couple’s rumored move-in together. Fans praised how Thompson’s love seems to have brought out a softer, more radiant side of Megan. Speaking with Jennifer Hudson earlier this week, Megan opened up about how this chapter of her life feels different.“I’m in such a feminine era,” she said. “I’ve been through so much, and I feel like I was always on defense. But now I’m calm, relaxed, and more accepting of love.”Also Read: NBA’s highly anticipated Europe-based league’s potential release date revealed
Article Summary: Klay thompson arrived late to pick up his girlfriend, rapper megan thee stallion, from the airport. The dallas mavericks star went viral for his heartfelt apology and his remorse. The clip, shared by megan on social media, captured the nba star trying to make amends.

Article Title: C.J. Stroud injury update: Insider breaks silence on Texans QB’s health struggles as his return timeline remains unclear
Article Text:
C.J. Stroud's health struggles have sparked concern.(Image via Stacy Revere/Getty)

C.J. Stroud is reportedly not well as he continues to miss practice



More coverage on the NFL -

The Houston Texans’ star player, C.J. Stroud, has been dealing with a brutal concussion as his absence has sparked some concern among fans.The Houston Texans have won four out of the nine matches played so far in the new season as fans await C.J. Stroud’s return to the field. Amid all the speculations, there has been an update on C.J. Stroud’s health as he continues to be away from the field after facing a concussion.A few hours ago, KPRC 2’s Aarion Wilson’s report has indicated that the Houston Texans’ star player, C.J. Stroud, is still pretty unwell.The report reads as, “Texans quarterback C.J. Stroud is still dealing with symptoms and remains under the NFL concussion protocol, preventing him from returning to practice…”The report added, “Stroud’s status under the protocol is expected to sideline him for a second game in a row Sunday against the Tennessee Titans with backup Davis Mills prepping to start again, per league sources.”A few days ago, the Houston Texans’ head coach, DeMeco Ryans, spoke to reporters in a press conference as he opened up about the injured players of the team.The Houston Texans’ head coach, DeMeco Ryans, said, “For C.J., Tytus, and Jalen, all three guys are still in the concussion protocol…”DeMeco Ryans added, “We’ll see, you know, how they progress throughout the week.”C.J. Stroud was missing all week from the practice sessions as the Houston Texans geared up to face the Jacksonville Jaguars last weekend.While the Houston Texans did manage to beat the Jacksonville Jaguars, it seems C.J. Stroud wont turn up to face the Tennessee Titans either as he has already missed practice for it on Wednesday.With Davis Mills now replacing C.J. Stroud on the field, Mills opened up about it on 5th November as he said, “Obviously, I’m ready. That’s kind of how I prepare week in week out. I’ve always had the mindset that you could play at any given snap. Unfortunately, what happened to C.J. in the game, I got thrown in there. But that’s what I I get paid to do…”
Article Summary: C.j. Stroud is reportedly not well as he continues to miss practice. Houston texans have won four out of the nine matches played so far in the new season. The texans' head coach, demeco ryans, said, “we’ll see, you know, how they progress throughout the week”

Article Title: Paolo Banchero injury update: Orlando Magic forward won’t return to game vs. New York Knicks
Article Text:
Paolo Banchero. Image via: Tim Heitman/Getty Images

Paolo Banchero exits early as Orlando Magic rule him out with left groin strain



Orlando Magic face a crucial stretch amid uncertainty over Banchero’s status



Orlando Magic star forward Paolo Banchero exited Wednesday night’s nationally televised matchup against the New York Knicks after sustaining a left groin strain during the second quarter. The team officially ruled him out for the remainder of the contest shortly after halftime. It’s an untimely setback for the 23-year-old, who has been the Magic’s offensive anchor this season.Banchero left the floor with 6:40 remaining in the second quarter and was initially listed as questionable to return. Before exiting, he logged 12 minutes of play, contributing four points on 1-of-4 shooting, along with four rebounds, two assists, one steal, and one block. His absence was felt almost immediately as Orlando’s early momentum slowed against a surging Knicks squad.The Orlando Magic confirmed that Paolo Banchero would not return due to a left groin strain, leaving fans and teammates concerned about his availability for upcoming games. The timing couldn’t be worse, as Orlando has been trying to find consistency after a rocky start to the season. With Banchero sidelined, forwards Jonathan Isaac and Tristan da Silva are expected to be called upon to absorb additional minutes.Banchero’s injury history adds another layer of concern. Last season, the forward missed several games due to an oblique injury, and the team will be cautious in evaluating his current status. Head coach Jamahl Mosley is expected to provide a medical update ahead of Friday’s matchup against the Brooklyn Nets. For now, Orlando can only hope the injury is minor and doesn’t sideline their All-Star long-term.In his fourth season, Banchero has averaged 23.3 points, 9.1 rebounds, and 4.3 assists in 34.6 minutes per game, ranking among the top young forwards in the Eastern Conference. His on-court leadership has been central to Orlando’s identity, particularly as the team battles for a playoff spot.Losing Banchero for any extended period could disrupt the Magic’s chemistry and test their depth. For now, all eyes will be on how quickly he recovers and whether the Magic can stay competitive without their franchise cornerstone. As of now, Magic has five wins and 6 defeats, but the team is eyeing to get back in the race in the standings as early as possible.Also Read: Klay Thompson’s girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion gets positive court update as Tory Lanez’s appeal dismissed in shooting case
Article Summary: Orlando magic star forward paolo banchero exited wednesday night’s nationally televised matchup against the new york knicks after sustaining a left groin strain. The team officially ruled him out for the remainder of the contest shortly after halftime. The 23-year-old has averaged 23.3 points, 9.1 rebounds, and 4.3 assists in 34.6 minutes per game this season.

Article Title: Travis Kelce opens up about meeting Tom Cruise during Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour, compares him to unexpected Hollywood star
Article Text: NFL star Travis Kelce met Hollywood icon Tom Cruise at Taylor Swift's Eras Tour, leaving him inspired by Cruise's intense focus and dedication. This encounter, alongside his new role in 'Happy Gilmore 2,' has reinforced Kelce's appreciation for discipline, teamwork, and the commitment required for elite performance, both on and off the field.

Article Title: GM Doug Armstrong weighs Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini’s role in Canada’s Olympic Roster
Article Text:
Connor Bedard (Image Via Twitter)

Are Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini ready to earn Doug Armstrong’s trust for the 2026 Olympics?

Do Bedard and Celebrini deserve spots on Team Canada's Olympic roster?

Two young NHL stars — Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini — are under the spotlight, as Team Canada is set to participate in the 2026 Winter Olympics in Italy. Both players have shown incredible maturity, and the debate has started about whether the next generation will finally get a chance at Canada’s Olympic roster. With the NHL players back on the Olympic ice, there is a fierce fight for the spots, and the outstanding play of Bedard and Celebrini is making the management reconsider its traditional veteran-heavy approach.In a chat with insider Pierre LeBrun, Team Canada GM Doug Armstrong recently detailed the problem of creating a roster that is loaded with elite talent. Armstrong confessed that the younger players are pushing their way into serious consideration. “There’s no age limit, at the high end or the low end,” he said. “I’m going to say some of the guys at the low end have really … they’ve found us. Connor Bedard has been playing some great hockey right now. He’s taken his game up to a level it wasn’t at last year.” His comments emphasize the extent to which the front office is starting to recognize and be influenced by this new wave of skill and energy.For decades, Team Canada has been relying on veteran players who have won Stanley Cups, Olympic gold, and have a lot of playoff experience.However, Bedard and Celebrini point to the same old formula. Both have proved that they can handle the pressure and also improve others around them, which is exactly the quality that could re-energize the team that has been mostly structured and reliable. The acceptance of the young stars would mean a daring move, that is, to the side of speed, creativity, and a fearless approach to international play.With the 2026 Olympics coming closer, Armstrong has the most fascinating roster dilemma in recent Canadian hockey history. Should the performance of Bedard and Celebrini remain the same, it may be impossible not to include them in the roster - their participation may even signify the birth of a new era for Team Canada.More coverage on NHL
Article Summary: Team canada is set to participate in the 2026 winter olympics in italy. Two young nhl stars — connor bedard and macklin celebrini — are under the spotlight. Both players have shown incredible maturity, and the debate has started about whether the next generation will finally get a chance at canada's olympic roster.

Article Title: Gabriel Landeskog ends three-year goal wait as Colorado Avalanche defeat Ducks to extend strong NHL season
Article Text:
Gabriel Landeskog nets first goal in over three years (Image via: Getty Images)

Gabriel Landeskog scores first goal in three years, boosts Colorado Avalanche offense



More coverage on NHL:

Gabriel Landeskog finally scored his first regular-season goal in over three years, leading the Colorado Avalanche to a 4-1 victory over the Anaheim Ducks at Ball Arena. The longtime Avalanche captain had faced frustration earlier this season with two goals wiped out by offsides challenges, but Tuesday night’s tally was undeniable. Landeskog’s goal not only lifted the team but also highlighted Colorado’s consistency and resilience this NHL season.The Avalanche have been unstoppable at home, showcasing an ability to capitalize on scoring chances and disrupt opponents’ momentum. By ending the Ducks’ seven-game run, Colorado added another statement win to their growing list of victories this season. Landeskog’s return to the scoresheet provides a morale boost for the team, reinforcing his role as a key leader and scorer for the Avalanche.Landeskog’s goal came 11:37 into the second period, following a chaotic sequence that began when Sam Malinski’s stick broke on the initial shot attempt. Valeri Nichushkin quickly gathered the puck and fired a rebound toward the net, which Landeskog calmly redirected past Ducks goalie Lukáš Dostál. The goal finally broke the captain’s long wait and energized both the team and fans at Ball Arena.Earlier this season, Colorado’s power play struggled, ranking among the lower half of the NHL. However, recent improvements have pushed the Avalanche into a three-way tie for 11th, converting 17.5% of their opportunities.Martin Nečas’ third-period goal against Anaheim was a product of this revitalized man-advantage strategy, helping Colorado maintain a comfortable lead and control over the game.This win marks the third time this season the Avalanche have halted an opponent’s extended winning streak, previously doing so against the New Jersey Devils and Tampa Bay Lightning. Colorado’s ability to stay composed under pressure, capitalize on rebounds, and maintain aggressive offensive positioning has made them one of the NHL’s toughest teams to beat.Gabriel Landeskog scored his first regular-season goal in over three years, giving the Colorado Avalanche a significant boost as they continue their strong NHL season. With key players hitting their stride and the team executing effectively at even strength and on the power play, Colorado is well-positioned to maintain momentum and remain a top contender this season.
Article Summary: Gabriel landeskog finally scored his first regular-season goal in over three years, leading the colorado avalanche to a 4-1 victory over the anaheim ducks at ball arena. The longtime avalanche captain had faced frustration earlier this season with two goals wiped out by offsides challenges, but tuesday night’s tally was undeniable.

Article Title: Jerry Jones gets emotional sharing how Cowboys will honor Marshawn Kneeland after shocking death at 24: "Everybody evaluates everybody"
Article Text:
Jerry Jones reveals how the Dallas Cowboys will honor Marshawn Kneeland after his tragic death (Getty Images)

Jerry Jones honors Marshawn Kneeland’s life and legacy



More NFL coverage

The Dallas Cowboys are finding ways to cope with the devastating loss of defensive end Marshawn Kneeland, who died on November 6 at the age of 24. Cowboys owner and general manager Jerry Jones broke his silence about the tragedy during an interview with Dallas-Fort Worth’s 105.3 The Fan, revealing emotional plans to honor Kneeland’s memory.The news has shaken the entire Cowboys community, leaving teammates and fans struggling to comprehend the loss of a young player who was only beginning his NFL journey.Jerry Jones confirmed that Cowboys players will wear a special decal on their helmets for the rest of the NFL season in memory of Kneeland. The design is still being finalized, but the gesture reflects how deeply the team wants to keep his spirit close. During Monday Night Football against the Las Vegas Raiders on November 17, players will also wear t-shirts honoring Kneeland during warm-ups. The tribute will continue when the Cowboys return home to AT&T Stadium to face the Philadelphia Eagles on November 23-- their first home game since Kneeland’s death, which Jones said left them “devastated. ”“Just hard to believe the content that was on the other phone in the middle of the night when we all got the news,” Jones told 105.3 The Fan, his voice heavy with emotion.Authorities found Kneeland’s body in Frisco with an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound, just hours after a police chase. According to dispatch audio obtained by PEOPLE, his family had received “a group text from him saying goodbye” shortly before his death.Jones spoke about the intense pressures NFL players face, both on and off the field. “Everybody evaluates everybody, it's the nature of it. You're under an evaluation almost from the time you get up until you go to bed,” he said, reflecting on the mental strain that often remains unseen. “No one gets more attention, no one gets any more scrutiny, no one gets any more critiquing than these guys that play this game... He lived that life every day. ”Remembering Kneeland, Jones added, “He was very unique in his zest for life… He was very unique in his passion for the game.” His words carried a deep sense of loss for a player who, as Jones said, “was just getting started.”The Cowboys held a team meeting led by head coach Brian Schottenheimer and psychologist Heather Twedell to help players process the tragedy. The team also leaned on The Defensive Line Foundation, an organization that supports individuals and families facing mental health crises.Through every tribute and conversation, one thing is clear -- Marshawn Kneeland’s spirit will remain a part of the Cowboys family forever.
Article Summary: Jerry jones reveals how the dallas cowboys will honor marshawn kneeland after his tragic death. Cowboys players will wear a special decal on their helmets for the rest of the nfl season. The team also leaned on the defensive line foundation, an organization that supports individuals and families facing mental health crises.

Article Title: Rob Gronkowski shares fun banter with Robert Kraft after one-day Patriots contract ahead of Thursday Night Football
Article Text:
Rob Gronkowski’s playful banter with Robert Kraft (Image via: Getty Images)

Rob Gronkowski’s Patriots legacy, career achievements, and moments with Robert Kraft



More coverage in NFL:

Rob Gronkowski might be retired from active play, but his quick wit and larger-than-life personality continue to make headlines. On November 12, the former New England Patriots tight end stole the spotlight during his one-day contract signing with the team, engaging in playful banter with Patriots owner Robert Kraft. The lighthearted exchange showcased Gronkowski’s charm and reminded everyone why he remains one of the NFL ’s most entertaining figures, even off the field.During the event, Kraft jokingly asked Gronkowski if he would be willing to sign a two-day contract, just enough to suit up for New England’s Thursday Night Football clash against the New York Jets on November 13. True to form, Gronkowski replied with humor and energy: “Let’s do it! What’s the signing bonus?” Kraft chuckled, saying, “Nothing’s changed,” creating a memorable moment that highlighted their longtime friendship and Gronkowski’s playful nature.Gronkowski played nine seasons with the Patriots from 2010 to 2018, establishing himself as one of the best tight ends in NFL history. He holds franchise records for career touchdown receptions (79), games with multiple touchdowns (16), and 100+ yard games by a tight end (26). After quarterback Tom Brady left for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in 2020, Gronkowski joined him, winning another Super Bowl before retiring for the second time in 2021.His unmatched combination of athleticism, leadership, and charisma cemented his place among the Patriots’ all-time greats and one of the NFL’s most memorable players.The one-day contract and humorous exchange with Kraft emphasized Gronkowski’s contributions on and off the field. While he won’t be suiting up against the Jets, his playful interaction with Kraft reinforced why Gronkowski remains a standout personality in the NFL and a key figure in Patriots history.Even after retiring, Gronkowski continues to be a central figure in Patriots culture, often appearing at team events and media appearances. His legacy extends beyond statistics—his leadership, personality, and memorable moments with Robert Kraft have left a lasting impact on the organization and the NFL as a whole, keeping him relevant and celebrated years after his final game.
Article Summary: Former new england patriots tight end rob gronkowski retired from the nfl in 2018. On november 12, gronkowski signed a one-day contract with the team. Kraft jokingly asked gronkowski if he would sign a two-day deal to suit up against the new york jets on november 13. Gronkowski replied with humor and energy: "let's do it!

Article Title: Garrett Wilson injury update: Coach Aaron Glenn stays silent as Jets star’s season hangs by a thread after new setback
Article Text:
Garrett Wilson exits after re-injuring his right knee during the Jets’ win over the Browns (Image via Getty)

Jets star ruled out as knee sprain worsens, could miss a month

New York Jets offense faces critical setback as Garrett Wilson recovery timeline confirmed

Garrett Wilson’s injury update is bad news for the New York Jets. The star wide receiver will not play in Week 11 after re-aggravating his right knee during Sunday’s win over the Cleveland Browns. According to ESPN’s Rich Cimini, Wilson is expected to miss three to four weeks with a knee sprain.He already missed two games earlier this season because of a hyperextended knee. Now, after just one game back, Wilson is sidelined again. The only positive development is that he avoided surgery, which keeps his hopes of returning before the regular season ends alive.Garrett Wilson suffered the injury while diving for a catch in the second half against Cleveland. He limped off and did not return. Head coach Aaron Glenn confirmed the injury involved the same knee that kept Wilson out in October. When reporters pressed him for a recovery timeline, Glenn declined to comment, citing ongoing evaluations.By Monday afternoon, ESPN reported that Garrett Wilson had a right knee sprain and would be out for at least three to four weeks. The team listed him as “out” on the Week 11 injury report after he missed consecutive practices.The Jets face the New England Patriots on Thursday night, and Wilson’s absence leaves a major gap in the offense.Before getting hurt again, Wilson had 36 catches for 395 yards and four touchdowns through seven games. It was the first time in his career he went without a single reception, as he was held catchless against Cleveland.With Garrett Wilson injured, the Jets’ offense is facing a serious test. Veteran Josh Reynolds remains on injured reserve because of a hip injury, and Allen Lazard was a healthy scratch last week. If Lazard sits again, the Jets’ wide receiver group will rely on rookie Arian Smith, Adonai Mitchell, Tyler Johnson, and John Metchie III, who just made his debut after being traded from the Philadelphia Eagles.Quarterback Justin Fields managed only six completions for 54 yards against the Browns, with most of that yardage coming from a short pass to Breece Hall. The Jets finished with 169 total yards in the game despite pulling off their second straight win after starting the season 0-7.Garrett Wilson’s injury comes at the worst possible moment for New York. The Jets finally found momentum under first-year coach Aaron Glenn, and losing their top wideout could stall that progress. If Wilson’s recovery stays on schedule, he could return as early as Dec. 7 against the Miami Dolphins or Dec. 14 against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
Article Summary: Garrett wilson suffered the injury while diving for a catch in the second half against cleveland. Head coach aaron glenn confirmed the injury involved the same knee that kept wilson out in october. Wilson avoided surgery, which keeps his hopes of returning before the regular season ends alive.

Article Title: Jayden Daniels injury update: Insider drops new details about Washington Commanders’ star QB's recovery and possible return
Article Text:
Jayden Daniels' injury has sparked concern among fans.(Image via Patrick Smith/Getty Images)

NFL insider drops updates on Jayden Daniels’ potential return to the field as the Washington Commanders struggle



More coverage on the NFL -



Jayden Daniels, the Washington Commanders’ star player, has sparked concern among fans as he remains off the field while the team is going through a rough time.The Washington Commanders have won just one out of the last six matches as fans are now stressed about the team’s future. Amid all the mess, NFL insider Tom Pelissero has dropped an update on Jayden Daniels’ potential return to the field.A few days ago, NFL insider Tom Pelissero reported, “Let’s talk about Commanders QB, Jayden Daniels, who does have a chance to return this season after there was positive news from medical opinions and an MRI this week.”The popular NFL insider added, “His dislocated left elbow is not as serious as initially feared, and he does not need surgery. Commanders did not immediately put Jayden Daniels on the injury reserve, which makes him eligible to return within the next four games…”NFL insider Tom Pelissero continued, “But it’s no guarantee, at this point, that Jayden Daniels returns at all…”Neither the team nor Jayden Daniels has responded to the speculations about the popular quarterback’s return to the field as the Washington Commanders continues to struggle on the field.For the unversed, Jayden Daniels was suffering from a brutal hamstring injury before the Seattle Seahawks match. The popular quarterback missed the game against the Kansas City Chiefs due to this injury.Unfortunately, as Jayden Daniels returned to the field to face the Seattle Seahawks, he dislocated his left elbow, which caused him to walk away from the field in the middle of the match.Jayden Daniels failed to return to the field as the team faced a brutal loss against the Seattle Seahawks.In the last few matches, the Washington Commanders have lost against the Chicago Bears, the Dallas Cowboys, the Kansas City Chiefs, the Seattle Seahawks and the Detroit Lions.This has sparked concern and panic among fans as many are concerned about the team’s future in the new season.Many fans also had a lot of hopes for Jayden Daniels in the new season but his injuries have fans panicking over his future in the team.
Article Summary: Nfl insider drops updates on jayden daniels’ potential return to the field. Washington commanders have won just one out of the last six matches as fans are stressed about the team’s future. Nfl insider tom pelissero said, “his dislocated left elbow is not as serious as initially feared, and he does not need surgery.

Article Title: Grigor Dimitrov and Eiza González’s cozy Costa Rica pictures spark buzz after Taylor Fritz’s girlfriend Morgan Riddle shows love online
Article Text:
Grigor Dimitrov and Eiza González’s cozy Costa Rica pictures spark buzz after Taylor Fritz’s girlfriend Morgan Riddle shows love online (Image via Getty)

Grigor Dimitrov’s girlfriend Eiza González stands by him after injury

Grigor Dimitrov and his girlfriend, Mexican actress Eiza González, are spending their off-season in Costa Rica after a long and tough 2025 tennis year. Eiza shared a set of sweet photos from their vacation on Instagram, showing the couple enjoying sunsets, beaches, and waterfalls.The post showed Grigor Dimitrov and Eiza González smiling together under a waterfall, relaxing in the sun, and enjoying quiet beach moments. Eiza looked stunning in a black bikini as she posed near the falls. She captioned the post, “Pura Vida Mae.”The post quickly caught fans’ attention, and even got a cute comment from Morgan Riddle, the girlfriend of tennis star Taylor Fritz. Morgan wrote, “Cutiesss” under the post, cheering for the couple.The Bulgarian tennis star ended his 2025 season early due to a pectoral muscle injury. He had to withdraw from the Paris Masters during his Round-of-32 match against Daniil Medvedev. This was the same injury that stopped him from finishing his Wimbledon match earlier this year against Jannik Sinner.After a roller-coaster season filled with highs and lows, the 34-year-old is finally taking some time off to relax with his girlfriend.González has been his biggest supporter through it all. When Grigor Dimitrov pulled out of Wimbledon, she shared a heartfelt message for him on Instagram.She wrote, “Love of my life. I couldn’t be more proud of you. You are beyond outstanding. This is just a moment that will pass and make you even stronger. You are a winner. We all saw it. And you’ll do it again.”Earlier this year, the pair also attended the Prada SS26 show at Milan Fashion Week. Grigor Dimitrov wore a brown leather jacket, while Eiza rocked a white Prada jacket. Dimitrov later shared pictures from their fashion week visit with a short caption on Instagram, celebrating their stylish moment together.Now, as they unwind in Costa Rica, the couple seems happy and at peace. Fans flooded the comments with love, calling them one of the most adorable pairs in tennis.Also Read: Chris Eubank Jr’s Twin Baby Announcement With Mystery Girlfriend Steals Spotlight Before Conor Benn Rematch
Article Summary: Grigor dimitrov and his girlfriend, mexican actress eiza gonzález, are spending their off-season in costa rica. The bulgarian tennis star ended his 2025 season early due to a pectoral muscle injury. He had to withdraw from the paris masters during his round-of-32 match against daniil medvedev.

Article Title: Morgan Geekie drops savage reply to fan mocking Bruins’ bench-clearing celebration of David Pastrnak’s 400th goal
Article Text:
Morgan Geekie slams fan criticizing David Pastrnak’s 400th goal (Image via: Getty Images)

Morgan Geekie fires back at fan mocking David Pastrnak’s 400th goal celebration



More coverage on NHL:

The Boston Bruins have been on a tear this season, and their recent performance against the Toronto Maple Leafs only reinforced their dominance. A highlight of that game was David Pastrnak reaching the 400-goal milestone in the NHL , a feat that reflects his consistent scoring ability and status as one of the league’s elite forwards. The goal set the stage for an energetic celebration that showcased the Bruins’ team spirit and camaraderie.Beyond the scoreboard, the Bruins’ unity was on full display. From the bench to the ice, the players rallied around Pastrnak, signaling the strength of the locker room and the close-knit nature of the roster. Such celebrations are emblematic of the team’s culture, emphasizing support for individual milestones while maintaining collective energy.During the game, an X user named Kevin Maggiore criticized the bench-clearing celebration, calling it “a dumb move.” He wrote, “I'll be the dweeb.... Entire team coming out for a 400th goal is kinda dumb.” The comment quickly caught attention online, prompting a sharp response from Morgan Geekie. The Bruins forward fired back, telling the fan, “Stick to your day job, Kevin.” Geekie’s reply resonated with fans who viewed it as a defense of both Pastrnak’s milestone and the team’s chemistry.The exchange also showed how social media has become a space where fans and players openly debate big moments in the NHL.David Pastrnak’s 400th goal also served as a momentum boost for Boston, contributing to the Bruins’ current seven-game winning streak and an 11-7-0 record that places them second in the Atlantic Division. Celebrating milestones like this is more than a spectacle; it reinforces morale, energizes players, and keeps fans engaged, highlighting the Bruins’ cohesion on and off the ice. These moments also help build excitement for the team’s fanbase, keeping supporters invested in every game.As Boston continues its strong push in the division, moments like Pastrnak’s milestone and Geekie’s assertive response will be remembered as key highlights of the 2025 season. The combination of individual achievement and collective celebration clearly underscores the Bruins’ resilience and team-first mentality.
Article Summary: The boston bruins celebrated david pastrnak's 400th goal against the toronto maple leafs. A fan criticized the celebration, calling it "a dumb move" morgan geekie responded by telling the fan to "stick to your day job, kevin"

Article Title: Brandon Ingram pauses victory celebration after beating Brooklyn Nets for one heart-stirring moment with Glorilla no one saw coming
Article Text:
Brandon Ingram (Image via Getty)

Brandon Ingram and Glorilla create viral courtside moment as Toronto Raptors edge past Brooklyn Nets

Brandon Ingram made headlines for all the wrong reasons recently. The Toronto Raptors’ star lost his cool and went on to smash a water bottle on the floor after losing against the Philadelphia 76ers. The incident did leave social media burning and reportedly, Ingram was fined around $25,000 for the irresponsible act. Dispute generating waves in the NBA world, Brandon Ingram diverted media attention with his heartwarming gesture after defeating Brooklyn Nets in the recent game.According to a viral clip from Toronto Raptors vs. In Brooklyn Nets’ recent match, Brandon Ingram was seen shaking hands with Glorilla in his signature style. The NBA star had paused the victory celebrations to acknowledge the moment with Glorilla at the stands. The couple made their relationship public recently. Glorilla is often spotted at the stands rooting for Ingram during Toronto Raptor's games.Brandon Ingram left his fans wanting for more after sharing a lovely moment with Glorilla recently. The Toronto Raptors’ star almost halted the victory moment during a recent game against Brooklyn Nets with a simple gesture.According to the viral clip, Ingram was seen shaking hands with Glorilla in his signature style pausing the victory moment at the Barclay’s Centre. The popular rapper looked happy while sharing a wholesome moment with her NBA man.Everything clicked for Brandon Ingram on Tuesday, a big turnaround from how he felt just a few days earlier after the water bottle facade. He led the Toronto Raptors with 25 points and helped secure their sixth win in 11 games. Ending the night at Barclays Center with a warm moment shared with his girlfriend made it even better for the 28-year-old forward. Ingram and the Raptors will try to keep the momentum going on Thursday against a Cleveland Cavaliers team playing the second night of a back-to-back.The Toronto Raptors’ starting lineup is strong, with Scottie Barnes, Immanuel Quickley, RJ Barrett, Jakob Poeltl, and Brandon Ingram. The bench adds energy with young players like recent lottery picks Collin Murray-Boyles and Gradey Dick. A 6–5 record is a good sign for a team that won only 30 games last season.Also Read: Brandon Clarke has been sidelined? Memphis Grizzlies suffer major setback as NBA pro undergoes knee procedure
Article Summary: Brandon ingram and glorilla create viral courtside moment as toronto raptors edge past brooklyn nets. Toronto raptors’ star lost his cool and went on to smash a water bottle on the floor after losing against the philadelphia 76ers. The incident did leave social media burning and reportedly, ingram was fined around $25,000.

Article Title: “Pray for the downfall”: Michelle Beadle hits out at Stephen A. Smith's Papaya deal, sparking fiery comeback and fresh feud
Article Text:
Stephan A. Smith and Michelle Beadle (Image via: Getty)

Stephan A. Smith’s fiery rant brings his feud with Michelle Beadle back to life

The long-running rivalry between Michelle Beadle and Stephen A. Smith has burst back into the spotlight after Beadle ripped into Smith’s new partnership with gaming firm Papaya — a deal clouded by a lawsuit — triggering his heated on-air response and reigniting one of sports media’s most bitter feuds. The outspoken former ESPN host called out Smith for teaming up with Papaya, a mobile gaming company accused in a federal lawsuit of using bots to deceive players in paid competitions.On her Beadle and Decker podcast, Beadle didn’t hold back, saying, “It’s not secret how I feel about that human. I’m not a religious person, but I pray for the downfall. I really do.” She went on to call the partnership “gross” and questioned Smith’s ethics, arguing that it sends a terrible message to fans and the industry alike. The backlash intensified because the deal was announced just months after Smith was caught playing solitaire during the NBA Finals — the very event he was covering as a top analyst.Smith, known for his fiery personality and unmatched presence in sports broadcasting, fired back with a defiant monologue on Mad Dog Sports Radio. Without naming Beadle, his message was unmistakable. “I hear people talking about me on SiriusXM and who they would have preferred and who they would have wanted or whatever.I’ve been doing this for 30 years,” he said. “You got some people that were in this business and they talk smack now cause they can’t get a job in the business… they just didn’t know how to act. ” His response was a blend of confidence and frustration — the kind of tone that’s made him a polarizing figure in sports media.Beadle’s criticism went far beyond the Papaya deal. She accused Smith of being overpaid and underperforming, saying, “ESPN pays him a gazillion dollars to get a lot of stuff wrong and yell. He gets caught playing solitaire during the NBA freaking Finals.” Her comments reflected a deep disdain for what she views as Smith’s unchecked influence and the network’s willingness to overlook his behavior. Beadle framed the partnership as proof that principles often take a backseat to profit in today’s sports broadcasting landscape.The company at the center of the storm, Papaya, is facing a federal lawsuit alleging that it used “bots masquerading as human players” in online games where users competed for real money. Papaya has denied the claims and filed counterclaims, but the legal dispute has cast a shadow over Smith’s endorsement deal. Critics argue that aligning with a company under investigation could harm his credibility, especially as one of the most recognizable voices in sports.This latest clash adds another chapter to Beadle and Smith’s tense history. Their feud dates back to 2014, when Beadle called out Smith for implying that women sometimes “provoke” domestic violence during the Ray Rice scandal. Her blunt response — “I’ll never feel clean again” — became symbolic of her refusal to stay silent. Over the years, the two have traded barbs, but this latest exchange feels more personal than ever. With Beadle out of SiriusXM and Smith expanding his empire, their rivalry has evolved into a battle of principle versus power — and this time, the internet is watching every move.Also read: Stephen Nedoroscik spills rugby star Ilona Maher’s message for his special ‘Dancing with the Stars’ cameo
Article Summary: Stephan a. smith’s fiery rant brings his feud with michelle beadle back to life. The outspoken former espn host called out smith for teaming up with papaya, a mobile gaming company accused in a federal lawsuit of using bots to deceive players in paid competitions.

His legacy is further cemented with this significant accomplishment.

This historic win comes as cena nears the end of his wwe farewell tour, with only a few more appearances scheduled before his final match in december. Article Title: Islamabad blast: Eight Sri Lanka cricketers return from Pakistan; second ODI in doubt
Article Text:
Sri Lanka's Kamil Mishara, center, and Pathum Nissanka, left, run between the wickets as Pakistan's Babar Azam watches during the first ODI match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka, in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, Tuesday, Nov. 11, 2025. (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Afghanistan cricketer on air strike by Pakistan, constant support from India

As many as eight Sri Lankan players touring Pakistan for a three-match ODI series will return home on Thursday after raising concerns about their safety, news agency PTI reported. Their decision comes a day after a bomb blast in Islamabad killed 12 people and injured several others.Because of this, the second ODI scheduled for Thursday in Rawalpindi may not take place. Pakistan won the first ODI by six runs at the same venue on Tuesday.Sri Lanka is also scheduled to play a triangular series with Pakistan and Zimbabwe after the ODI series."The second ODI against Pakistan tomorrow is in doubt, but substitute players will be sent to continue the tri-nation series," a Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) source was quoted as saying by the news agency AFP.PTI reported that the Sri Lankan players wanted to return because Rawalpindi, the venue for the matches, is close to Islamabad, where the blast took place.In 2009, the Sri Lankan team bus was attacked by gunmen on the way to the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore for the second Test. Several players, including Ajantha Mendis, Chaminda Vaas and captain Mahela Jayawardene, were injured, and Pakistani security personnel were killed.After that attack, foreign teams did not tour Pakistan for more than 10 years, forcing Pakistan to host home series at neutral venues in the Middle East.International cricket returned to Pakistan when Sri Lanka toured the country in December 2019.Meanwhile, Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) said it had been informed by the team management that several members of the national side currently touring Pakistan had requested to return home, citing safety concerns. Following this development, SLC engaged with the players and assured them that their concerns were being addressed in close coordination with the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) and relevant authorities to ensure the safety and well-being of everyone involved.SLC has instructed all players, support staff, and team management to continue with the tour as scheduled. However, if any player or staff member still decides to return to Sri Lanka, replacements will be sent immediately to ensure the tour continues without disruption.
Article Summary: As many as eight sri lankan players will return home on thursday. Their decision comes a day after a bomb blast in islamabad killed 12 people. The second odi scheduled for thursday in rawalpindi may not take place. Pakistan won the first odi by six runs at the same venue on tuesday.
